actions.name: Brave Heart

cost.trigger: A foe within 5m gains at least one positive stage from an effect.

actions.description:
Trigger: A foe within 5m gains at least one positive stage from an effect.
Effect: The user gains +X ATK stages for 5 activations, where X is equal to total number of stages raised by that effect.

system.description:
Trigger: A foe within 5m gains at least one positive stage from an effect.
Effect: The user gains +X ATK stages for 5 activations, where X is equal to total number of stages raised by that effect.
